name: Derelict (itch) (vfqd)
description:
Derelict is a procedurally generated twin stick shooter made in 48hrs for the 2018 South African game jam with the theme "Escalating Possibilities."

Each wave you survive the the game, a new randomly generated condition will be added to the game, these can range from "When you step on a red button, become invulnerable for 5 seconds" to "When you kill an enemy, spawn a bomb" etc.

Made with:

- Unity & Pyxel Edit

With audio by zircon
